title: All schools re-open from Tuesday (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Education said that schools will reopen on Tuesday (17).

A senior official of the Ministry of Education said that the Provincial Directors of Education and the Principals have been empowered to take action if there is an issue regarding the school time table.
Police arrest Ex-politico & municipal worker over attacks on MynaGoGama & GotaGoGama
